title: League playerbase in 2011: Achievements would be cool.
body:
"Here's all these fun and interesting ways to implement them and you even have space for it in your client! We can do all these things that wouldn't ruin gameplay!"

Riot in 2019: Haha. Yeah... So uh, how thick is your wallet, again?

_I really hope it costs minimal RP since you buy Eternals per champion in sets of 3._
